feature.label: Gamma Compiler Generator Plugin
feature.description: A plugin for editing Extend Affix Grammar files (.eag). If a Gamma comiler generator (https://github.com/linkrope/gamma) is installed then D code is generated which represents a full capable compiler corresponding to the given EAG specification. Requires Java8 until Java11 to run. May not run with Java17.
feature.license: Provided under the Eclipse Public License 2.0

update.label: Udate Site for the Gamma Compiler Generator plugin
